div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2072 Himera ?, 1892 (968) Burial: c. 470 B.C. (Tusa Cutroni) Contents: 35 AR Himera: 29 dr. (13 rev. incuse square; 12 rev. hen; 4 rev. unc.) 4 didr. (rev. crab) Selinus: 1 didr. (rev. leaf) 1 ob. Disposition: Palermo Gabrici, Monetazione, p. 207 Tusa Cutroni, AIIN 1956, p. 207, V
